a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTPoliobOPVIPV (IMMZ.D2.DT.Polio.bOPV plus IPV) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a polio vaccination according to the national immunization protocol * Decision Table: bOPV plus IPV schedule (applicable for all countries) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTPoliobOPVIPV

def.name: Patient
Client is not due for bOPV vaccination

expression.name: Client's age is less than 6 weeks

def.name: Client is not due for bOPV vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: 'Should not vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as client\'s age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first bOPV dose.'

expression.value: Should not vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as client's age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first bOPV dose.

def.name: Client is due for bOPV vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as no polio doses were administered and client\'s age is between 6 weeks and 3 months. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose as the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 3"

'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, bOPV dose was not administered and the first IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose as client\'s age is between 6 and 14 weeks and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 5"

'Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose as one bOPV dose and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 6"
'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as bOPV dose was not administered and two IPV doses were administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 7"

'Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 8"
'Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose as one bOPV dose and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 9"
'Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose as two bOPV doses and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

then.value: Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as no polio doses were administered and client's age is between 6 weeks and 3 months. Check for contraindications.

then.value: Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as bOPV dose was not administered and two IPV doses were administered. Check for contraindications.

then.value: Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 8

then.value: Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose as one bOPV dose and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 9

then.value: Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose as two bOPV doses and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose and first IPV dose as client\'s age is more than 3 months and no polio doses were administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose and second bOPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 3"

'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose and second IPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, bOPV dose was not administered and the first IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 4"

'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose and third bOPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, two bOPV doses and no IPV dose were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 5"

'Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose and second IPV dose as one bOPV dose and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 6"

'Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose and second IPV dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 1

def.name: Client is not due for polio vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as client\'s age is between 6 and 14 weeks, two bOPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as client\'s age is less than 14 weeks and three bOPV doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 5"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 6"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as one bOPV dose and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 7"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as three bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 8"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as two bOPV doses and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 1

'Should vaccinate client for second IPV dose as one bOPV dose and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, three bOPV doses were administered and IPV dose was not administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 5"

'Should vaccinate client for second IPV dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 6"
'Should vaccinate client for second IPV dose as three bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for bOPV vaccination"
'Should not vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as client\'s age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first bOPV dose.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as no polio doses were administered and client\'s age is between 6 weeks and 3 months. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose and first IPV dose as client\'s age is more than 3 months and no polio doses were administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose as the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose and second bOPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks and the latest bOPV was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 3"

'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, bOPV dose was not administered and the first IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 3"

'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose and second IPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, bOPV dose was not administered and the first IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as client\'s age is between 6 and 14 weeks, two bOPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose as client\'s age is between 6 and 14 weeks and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, IPV dose was not administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 4"

'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose and third bOPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, two bOPV doses and no IPV dose were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 3"

'Should vaccinate client for second IPV dose as one bOPV dose and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 5"

'Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose as one bOPV dose and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 5"

'Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose and second IPV dose as one bOPV dose and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 6"
'Should vaccinate client for first bOPV dose as bOPV dose was not administered and two IPV doses were administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as client\'s age is less than 14 weeks and three bOPV doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose as client\'s age is more than 14 weeks, three bOPV doses were administered and IPV dose was not administered. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 5"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 5"

'Should vaccinate client for second IPV dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 7"

'Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for bOPV and IPV vaccination Case 6"

'Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose and second IPV dose as two bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered, the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 6"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as one bOPV dose and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 8"
'Should vaccinate client for second bOPV dose as one bOPV dose and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 7"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as three bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered and the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 6"
'Should vaccinate client for second IPV dose as three bOPV doses and one IPV dose were administered and the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for polio vaccination Case 8"

'Should not vaccinate client for polio dose as two bOPV doses and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next polio dose.'
"Client is due for bOPV vaccination Case 9"
'Should vaccinate client for third bOPV dose as two bOPV doses and two IPV doses were administered and the latest bOPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Polio routine immunization schedule is complete. Five polio primary series doses were administered. Check for any vaccines due.'
